name: massd2d
description:
Exterminate hordes of insects in this game

  • Tons of enemies
  • 3 missions
  • 5 weapons
  • Dynamic lighting
  • Explosions

Languages: English, Russian.

Requirements:

  • Windows OS
  • Keyboard, mouse
  • OpenGL graphics (you probably have it)
  • .net framework 4.5 (Windows 8 + has it pre-installed)

Just unpack and run. No installer.

The game is written in C# programming language, using Otter 2D engine.
